tickets.title: Persist deterministic decisions and replay snapshots
tickets.problem: Replay and idempotency are currently in-memory and not durable.

Replay endpoint retrieves exact payload from storage by decision_id
Storage schema migration is documented and repeatable
test_plan: Integration test with restart to prove persistence
Replay fidelity diff against original payload
tickets.done_definition: Persistent replay works across process restarts

tickets.title: Implement persistent idempotency store with TTL
tickets.problem: Idempotency cache is memory-only and cannot survive restarts or scale-out.
tickets.objective: Add storage-backed idempotency keys with endpoint scoping and TTL cleanup.
acceptance_criteria: Idempotency-Key returns previously stored response for matching endpoint+key
TTL expiry policy is configurable
Cleanup job metrics exposed
test_plan: Duplicate request test returns identical response
Expired key test returns fresh decision
tickets.done_definition: Idempotency behavior is deterministic and durable
